entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.0°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -38.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
